Which one of the following Haworth projections is of the monosaccharide <b>&alpha;-D-glucose</b>?	A. <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="border: solid white 0px; border-collapse: collapse; border: white solid 0px;"><tbody><tr><td rowspan="3" style="border: solid white 0px; text-align: right; Which one of the following Haworth projections is of the monosaccharide <b>&alpha;-L-idose</b>?	A. <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="border: solid white 0px; border-collapse: collapse; border: white solid 0px;"><tbody><tr><td rowspan="3" style="border: solid white 0px; text-align: right; Which one of the following Haworth projections is of the monosaccharide <b>&beta;-D-glucose</b>?	A. <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="border: solid white 0px; border-collapse: collapse; border: white solid 0px;"><tbody><tr><td rowspan="3" style="border: solid white 0px; text-align: right; Which one of the following Haworth projections is of the monosaccharide <b>&beta;-L-idose</b>?	A. <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="border: solid white 0px; border-collapse: collapse; border: white solid 0px;"><tbody><tr><td rowspan="3" style="border: solid white 0px; text-align: right;
